name: Paper Shakespeare: The Legend of Rainbow Hollow
name_original: Paper Shakespeare: The Legend of Rainbow Hollow
description:
Once a paradise, the world of Arden has been transformed into a post-apocalyptic stick figure nightmare! Kingdoms that were peaceful are now at war with each other, country roads that used to be safe are now set upon by bandits! To make matters worse, people that were once themselves have woken up to a new transformed state: a human blacksmith may now be a dog, and roving groups of Faerie Dinosaurs stalk the land.

You have been called to go forth and.... well, figure this stuff out. Find out what's going on. Put a stop to it. Hopefully turn everything back 'round to normal. The usual brave adventurer stuff.

Save the very universe in this puzzle-based adventure game, based on all the plays by William Shakespeare that didn't quite make sense. This point-and-click plot will take you to vast cities, dark battlefields, and other cool places like that.

Specs, Windows:

  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 480 MB available space

Specs, Linux:

  • OS: x86 or compatible processor
  • Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 480 MB available space
